document.full_text: the mavericks shoved phil jackson one loss further toward retirement and the two-time defending champion lakers one loss closer to playoff elimination.
document.title: mavericks 98, lakers 92: with fourth-quarter rally, mavericks push jackson and lakers to brink
lines_and_colors: the mavericks shoved phil jackson one loss further toward retirement and the two-time defending champion lakers one loss closer to playoff elimination.
